friends.title: Sprialis consulting
friends.des: Sprialis Consulting offers expert advice, presentations, professional development programs and training and support in a broad portfolio of inclusive technology solutions.

friends.title: Sascha Roos MA, HDGC
friends.des: An author and dyslexia specialist supporting people with the challenges of dyslexia for over 15 years. She has a well-established private practice, and an approach that encourages the strengths and abilities of the dyslexic individual.
